content: these mitts are a super quick project they take less than one 100g skein of bulky weight yarn and stretch to fit many hand sizes you may even want to try out stripes or contrasting cuffs yarn one skein of plymouth superwash chunky 100g/123yds it knits up so fast and is just so cozy gauge 7 sts & 10 row/2 in st st on larger needles in the round sizes one size with adjustable length options needles us 9 & 10 or size needed to achieve gauge in 32 or longer circular needles or dpns www liftbridgeyarns com
